about_the_game:
Express yourself during the apocalypse with the Outbreak: Epidemic Deluxe Edition DLC! This DLC allows you to customize your flashlight and laser sight with fun colors that react to the game! Mix and match based on your preferences and show them off online in co-op, or keep it to yourself in single-player!

This DLC includes the following flashlight and laser sight customizations:
  • Rainbow - Experience the entire rainbow as colors transition in real-time.
  • Vitals - Color changes based on your health and bleeding status.
  • Treasure - A golden effect that offers greater item identify range!

Note: Change your flashlight and laser sight in the Options menu.

content_descriptors.notes: Outbreak: Epidemic features the usage of numerous firearms and melee weapons to fight off undead creatures. This violence includes blood, gore and other mature themes.
